show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld
other_title: Doraemon: Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld - The 7 Magic Users
Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Shin Makai Daibōken - Shichinin no Mahōtsukai (Japanese)
哆啦A梦：大雄的奇幻大冒险 (Chinese (PRC))
映画ドラえもん のび太の新魔界大冒険～7人の魔法使い～ (Japanese)
電影哆啦A夢：大雄的新魔界大冒險 ７人魔法使 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: Frustrated by the multitude of problems at school and at home, Nobita wonders if his life would be easier if magic really existed. He then asks Doraemon for his what-if-telephone-booth gadget which allows both to go to a parallel world where magic is ordinary to all. In the fascinating alternate reality, they find out that a demonic planet is approaching and threatens the lives of everyone over there. Doraemon, Nobita, and their friends must then find a hidden tome written by a wizard that defeated a similar menace a long time ago.
ending_theme: "Kakegae no Nai Uta" by Mihimaru GT
